body.name: 7in Meat Cleaver Damascus Chef Knife,Japanese VG10 Steel Core Sharp Knife,Multipurpose Kitchen Cooking Vegetable Cutting Knife,Ergonomic Rosewood Handle,Elegant Gift Box and Sheath
features: 【Multifunctional Kitchen knife】This 7-inch meat cleaver chef knife is a handcrafted innovation made with Japanese VG10 steel core and 66 layers of high-carbon stainless steel, combining the functions of a Japanese knife, vegetable knife, and Chinese cleaver. It efficiently handles various kitchen tasks while saving storage space and serving as a versatile tool for cutting vegetables, fruits, and meats.

【Durable and Long-lasting】This Japanese meat cleaver knife is crafted with a hardness exceeding 60HRC. It offers an extended period of sharpness retention, a lighter weight, and a longer service life compared to stainless steel knives. The vibrant blade pattern enhances its resistance to rust and discoloration, ensuring exceptional durability.

【Perfect Sharpness】The blade of this cleaver chef knife is expertly ground at an angle of 12-15 degrees on both sides, ensuring a delicate and incredibly sharp edge. It maintains its exceptional sharpness for up to six months, reducing the need for frequent sharpening and maintenance. The razor-sharp edge locks in food moisture, prevents sticking, and enhances the flavor and healthiness of your meals.

【Ergonomic Design】The 7-inch multi-purpose meat cleaver is designed with its center of gravity in the front of the blade, offering improved performance and handling ability. The ergonomically designed handle reduces fatigue and can be comfortably used by both left-handed and right-handed users. The durable solid wooden handle is resistant to oxidation and easy to maintain, ensuring excellent operability.

【Exceptional Shopping Service】KINGOD is a brand committed to high-quality products and services. We welcome your inquiries at any time and strive to provide exceptional customer support. If you want to surprise your cooking-loving friends and family, KINGOD's products are the perfect choice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Damascus Meat Cleaver Our knife is meticulously crafted with 33 layers of high carbon steel on each side, ensuring unparalleled durability and resistance to corrosion. With a VG10 steel core at its heart, it maintains long-lasting sharpness even after extensive use. The combination of these materials results in a total of 67 layers, showcasing our commitment to quality and excellence.Manufactured using advanced processes including forging, quenching, tempering, and nitrogen cooling, our knife embodies precision and reliability. Despite its small blade material, it boasts incredible sharpness and a high hardness level of 60HRC, guaranteeing effortless cutting and slicing.The Damascus knife blades feature intricate patterning that not only enhances their aesthetic appeal but also reflects the craftsmanship involved in their creation. Available in various styles such as the chef's knife, perfect for chopping vegetables and delicate meats, and the paring and utility knives with their versatile 5-inch blade size, these knives are indispensable in any kitchen setting.Whether you're a seasoned professional chef or an enthusiastic home cook, our knives are essential tools for preparing delicious meals for your loved ones. Experience the unmatched performance and craftsmanship of our Damascus knife collection and elevate your culinary skills to new heights.

Ultra-Sharp Edge Utilizing traditional wet manual cutting techniques and V-shaped sharpening technology, our blades achieve a cutting angle of 12-15 degrees on each side. This meticulous approach ensures long-lasting edge retention, resulting in blades that are robust and durable.
Solid Wood Handle The specially designed handle - easy to hold, and non-slip.

Corrosion-Resistant & Durable Our knife boasts a sharpness three times greater than that of stainless steel knives. With a high-brightness blade comparable to SG2 powder steel knives, its corrosion resistance and sharpness durability outshine the average chef's knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth it!!!!!
reviews.reviewText: I got this knife for trimming a tenderloin and would did it cut through it like butter. I have even used it to trim aged beef and you how tuff the crust can be on that. I do with it came with a sharpener to keep the blade up but still a good value for the money. I should have this knife for a long long time to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dad loves it
reviews.reviewText: Bought it for my dad for Christmas. He loves it more than me - JK.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Knife and Beautifully Weighted
reviews.reviewText: This knife is AMAZING. The weight is perfect and it keeps a fantastic edge. I picked it up to learn the Chinese chopping style and while I'm still building up my muscle memory I've moved to this knife for almost everything I used to use a traditional chef's knife for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a very well made knife ,razor sharp with high quality damascus steel...Buy with confidence...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This knife is very sharp, slices and chops very well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don't know if this budget damascus would pass an elite cook's critique, but as for ME, it's been the most awesome knife I've ever owned! Man! It just bites into anything you put underneath it -- it's *so* sharp... This one has a really nice weight to it, too, moreso than any of my other knives. As for aesthetics, it's very beautiful.. The wood handle is gorgeous and *perfectly* smooth. I don't know what kind of wood it is, but it has the same kind of iridescent glow in the woodgrain that you see in quarter sawn oak. And by a stroke of luck, the handle's shape is just perfect for the size of my hand. Being so pleased with the way this has held up and performed, I wouldn't hesitate to buy it as a gift for someone who likes to cook, as a 'special' seeming chef's knife. VERY nice...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth to buy it
reviews.reviewText: It is a great item and very comfortable for cutting meat or vegetables..
